news.title: Trump's return dims outlook for Chinese EV makers amid tariff threats
news.content: Chinese EV makers can opt to set up a base in the US, take the tariff blows or find new markets elsewhere, according to Pareto Economics.

news.title: The MicroStrategy of Dogecoin? This Firm Is Amassing DOGE as a Treasury Reserve Asset
news.content: As Dogecoin punches past a three-year high price, a Canadian company aims to legitimize the meme coin through investment and infrastructure.

news.title: 'X Empire' and 'Rocky Rabbit' Telegram Game Tokens Pump to All-Time High Prices
news.content: Tokens tied to Telegram tap-to-earn games are up, with the Elon Musk-themed X Empire leading the charge alongside Rocky Rabbit.
